page.title: 11TOURISM IN PERTH
page.content: As a focal point in the heart of Scotland,Perth has always been the country's crossroads. Today, a good network of road and rail links still centres on the city. Because of its centrality Perth can easily be used as a holiday base with such places as{GLENEAGLES,PITLOCHRY, {EDINBURGH}and{CRIEFF}close at hand. Perth offers a wide variety of services for both the "passive" and "active" tourist. For the "passive", many bus tours are available to the scenic parts of Scotland e.g.{Aviemore and the{Cairngorms.} For the "active" tourist there is a large sports complex,swimming pool, squash courts,ice rink and a fitness centre all in the city centre.Another activity for the tourist is fishing in the River Tay which is renowned for its salmon.
